card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NYou can only control 1 "Tsuchigumo, the Poisonous Mayakashi". You can only use each of these effects of "Tsuchigumo, the Poisonous Mayakashi" once per turn.$N●If a Synchro Monster in your possession whose original Level is 7 is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other Zombie monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card.$N●If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can have each player send the top 3 cards from their Deck to the GY.
